amendment.description: To provide a new system by which to resolve claims for bodily injury caused by asbestos exposure, and for other purposes.

action.text: Amendment SA 2748 proposed by Senator Cornyn to language proposed to be stricken by amendment no. 2746.
Motion to table amendment SA 2748 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 70 - 27. Record Vote Number: 13.
